ovdesc.p: The AA module has provided a ‘classic catalogue’ option that allows AC, AZ, LD and MG product parameter tables to be built using the AA product structure.The principles of the AA design allow the different elements in the applications to be specified and re-used in the product structure. When the product is published the existing application parameter is updated by mapping the property content into the parameter. Any other product can be added using OTHER product line.
The Product Line “OTHER” will not contain any PROPERTY.CLASSES. AA.PRODUCT.LINK can be used to define the linkage between the products and classic applications to be defined.
